Welcome to the UVa Hydroinformatics Lab

We are a group based at the University of Virginia. Our aim is to understand and analyze civil infrastructure and environmental systems as cyber-physical systems.

Previous Next

Our Research is focused in three main areas: Hydroinformatics, Integrated Environmental Modeling, and Resilient Infrastructure System. For more information about these see the Research page.

We are located at the University of Virginia in Charlottesville, Virginia. Within the University we collaborate with the Link Lab.

News

1. August 29, 2017

The National Science Foundation will suport Hydorinformatics and Link Lab research through two grants that total to more than 4 million dollars, article

2. July 14, 2017

Team Members Mohamed Morsy and Bakinam Tarik Essawy were interviewed on their work in Hydroinformatics by UVA Today
